title.rendered: Infographic: “Trading Cards” for Your Multi-Generational Workplace

content.rendered:
Refer to these “trading cards” to help you understand some of the ways that each generation in the workplace is unique. Learning Gen Z’s preferences can help you engage with them authentically–and hit early talent recruiting out of the park.

HS_NIN_TradingCards_Infographic

excerpt.rendered: An overview of generations currently represented in the workforce: baby boomers, Gen X, millennials/Gen Y, and Gen Z.
